public static void SaveInstance (Microsoft.ML.IHostEnvironment env, Microsoft.ML.Model.ModelSaveContext ctx, Microsoft.ML.Data.Schema schema);
.method public static hidebysig void SaveInstance(class Microsoft.ML.IHostEnvironment env, class Microsoft.ML.Model.ModelSaveContext ctx, class Microsoft.ML.Data.Schema schema) cil managed
static member SaveInstance : Microsoft.ML.IHostEnvironment * Microsoft.ML.Model.ModelSaveContext * Microsoft.ML.Data.Schema -> unit

Docs.summary:
Given the schema and a model context, save an imaginary instance of a binary loader with the specified schema. Deserialization from this context should produce a real binary loader that has the specified schema.
This is used in an API scenario, when the data originates from something other than a loader. Since our model file requires a loader at the beginning, we have to construct a bogus 'binary' loader to begin the pipe with, with the assumption that the user will bypass the loader at deserialization time by providing a starting data view.
